title: [Partnership] Slance
body:
# Motivation:
Videos are the most engaging way of content consumption while keeping the audience in their comfort zone. We believe that videos will have a positive impact on retail investors as well as ambitious contributors looking to get involved.

# Partner Info:
**Slance**
Website: www.slance.co
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/Slance 

Slance allows you to discover promising crypto projects and learn blockchain fundamentals to make better investment decisions. Their explainer videos include topics like Cryptocurrency (Crypto), Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), digital assets and Web 3.0.

# Activities:
- Slance will create scripts for branded videos based on information provided by ShineDAO and it’s projects
- ShineDAO & incubated project teams will review scripts
- Slance will produce branded explainer videos paid with project’s tokens (price negotiated case-by-case)
- ShineDAO will have the right to review video before publishing
- Slance will be posting all videos on their YouTube channel
- Slance will be able to add their branded intro and ending to the videos on YouTube
- ShineDAO gets the video version without Slance branding

# Other:
- ShineDAO will get their logo on the partners section on the website
- Slance will get their logo on the partners section on the website

# Partnership Referral Bonus
**Refferer:** King_Kunta#9877 
**Reward:** 5000 SHN
author: 0xb1D92EEec6f9F224ABD294DE643C94A01cB14E51
